## Academic and professional experience 

I am current MPH student at [Columbia University Irving Medical Center](https://www.cuimc.columbia.edu/). I am studying epidemiology major and certified in Applied Biostatistics and Data Science at [Mailman School of Public Health](https://www.publichealth.columbia.edu/academics). I studied public health science for almost 5 years during my undergraduate and graduate schools, because my goal is, to utilized what I learned, to make some efforts on healthcare field and helping people become healthier. I have several related internship experiences at [Pfizer](https://www.pfizer.com/), [Frost and Sullivan](https://www.frost.com/), National Center for Medical Service Administration and [Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention](https://www.chinacdc.cn/en/). If you would like to know more details about my academic and professional experience, please visit [my resume](myresume.html).
